allow: Bash(timeout 10 bash -c 'while ! netstat -ano | findstr :3000 > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 1; done; echo ""Backend is running on port 3000""')
Bash(timeout 5 bash -c 'while ! netstat -ano | findstr :3000 > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 0.5; done; echo ""Backend restarted successfully""')
Bash(timeout 10 bash -c 'while ! netstat -ano | findstr :3000 > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 0.5; done; echo ""Client is starting...""')
Bash(timeout 5 bash -c 'while ! netstat -ano | findstr :5001 > /dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 0.5; done; echo ""Backend is running on port 5001""')

Bash(powershell -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Drawing; $img = New-Object System.Drawing.Bitmap(493, 312); $g = [System.Drawing.Graphics]::FromImage($img); $g.Clear([System.Drawing.Color]::FromArgb(0, 120, 215)); $img.Save(''dialog.bmp'', [System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat]::Bmp); $g.Dispose(); $img.Dispose(); Write-Host ''Created dialog.bmp''")

Bash("C:\Program Files (x86)\WiX Toolset v3.14\bin\heat.exe" dir "nodejs" -cg NodeJsRuntime -dr NodeJsDir -var var.NodeJsPath -gg -scom -sreg -sfrag -srd -out NodeJsRuntime.wxs)

Bash("C:\Program Files (x86)\WiX Toolset v3.14\bin\candle.exe" Product.wxs ConfigDialog.wxs ClientFiles.wxs NodeModules.wxs NodeJsRuntime.wxs -dDistPath="../dist" -dNodeModulesPath="../../node_modules" -dNodeJsPath="nodejs" -dVersion="1.0.0.0" -ext WixUtilExtension -ext WixUIExtension -arch x64)

Bash("C:\Program Files (x86)\WiX Toolset v3.14\bin\light.exe" Product.wixobj ConfigDialog.wixobj ClientFiles.wixobj NodeModules.wixobj NodeJsRuntime.wixobj -ext WixUtilExtension -ext WixUIExtension -cultures:en-US -loc en-US.wxl -out "KioskClient-v1.0.0.0.msi")
